Wikipedia.description: The **Wikipedia** component scans the **Wikipedia** and returns an article - if anything valid is found under the entered search term.

props.name: data
props.description: either an array of texts from which to generate the word cloud or, if `precalculated` is set to `true`, and array of word count objects (with `text` and `value` keys)

props.name: font
props.description: accessor function specifying the font face for each word. Also accepts a constant instead of a function

props.name: fontSizeMapper
props.description: accessor function indicating the font size for each word. Defaults to `( count - min + 1 ) / ( max - min + 6 ) * 30.0 + 12.0`, where `min` and `max` denote the minimum and maximum word `counts`, respectively

props.name: height
props.description: height of the word cloud (in px)

props.name: language
props.description: language identifier (determines the stopwords to be removed)

props.name: minCount
props.description: if set, only include words that appear more than `minCount` times in the given data

props.name: saveButton
props.description: controls whether to display a button for saving the word cloud as an image

props.name: onClick
props.description: callback function invoked when a word on the word cloud is clicked

props.name: padding
props.description: accessor function or constant indicating the numerical padding for each word

props.name: precalculated
props.description: controls whether the word cloud expects an array of precalculated word counts or will generate them for given texts

props.name: rotate
props.description: accessor function indicating the rotation angle (in degrees) for each word. Also accepts a constant instead of a function

props.name: updateThreshold
props.description: batch size of new documents in `data` before the word cloud is re-rendered

props.name: stopwords
props.description: additional stopwords to remove before rendering the word cloud

props.name: triggerRender
props.description: rerender when the data set is exchanged

props.name: style
props.description: CSS inline styles

props.name: width
props.description: width of the word cloud (in px)

WordCloud.description: A word cloud component built on top of [d3-cloud](https://github.com/jasondavies/d3-cloud).
